altername_name: Fritzi Fisch und der verschwundene Schatz
name: Freddi Fish: Kelp Seed Mystery
overview: Grandma Grouper's kelp seeds are missing and, without them, all of the sea creatures will go hungry! Help underwater detective Freddi Fish and her finny friend Luther solve the case. Explore marine caves, deep canyons, and fascinating places like King Crab's Castle in an effort to rescue the colorful reef!
